participant_1.background:
I have a love for travel and my furry friends.
I'm working on getting my own place so I can ride my horse whenever I want.
i live with my parents.
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am an engineer who sings in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
my college courses are on philosophy and history.
i play in a nfl fantasy football league.
The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.

content.text: Not much, just finished helping a student pick out an outfit for a school event.  How about you?
I'm working on getting my own place so I can ride my horse whenever I want.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could ride horses.
It is a lot of fun. I love taking my son on weekend camping trips and picking wild strawberries.
That sounds like an amazing way to spend a weekend.
It is. I also love singing in my spare time.  What are your hobbies?

I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.  My college courses are on philosophy and history.  I play in a NFL fantasy football league.  The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.

That's really interesting.  I've never been interested in philosophy or history, but I love to sing!  I also play in a fantasy football league.  My most valued possession is my horse, because he's my best friend.
That's awesome!  I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument, but I've never had the time.
It's never too late to learn!  What kind of instrument would you like to learn to play?
I think I would like to learn to play the guitar.
That's a great choice!  Guitar is a lot of fun to play.
Thanks!  I think I'm going to start taking lessons soon.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll be a great guitar player.
Thanks!  I hope so.  I'm excited to learn.
Good luck!  I'm sure you'll do great.
